nodes.text: Darth Maul 4 is the fourth issue in the Star Wars: Darth Maul series of comics. It was published on December 6, 2000 by Dark Horse Comics.

With Sith Lord Darth Sidious' master plan for the overthrow of the Republic in jeopardy, Sidious' apprentice and enforcer Darth Maul has cut his way through the ranks of the galactic crime syndicate Black Sun, and now there is only one barrier left between Maul and Black Sun's total destruction. Maul must go toe-to-toe with the personal bodyguards of Black Sun's top lieutenants before he can reach the pinnacle of their organization! It's Black Sun vs. the dark side, and the winner takes all! This is one explosive finale you won't want to miss and is a key event in the Episode I story line!
